description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，原副国级领导人，陈云长子。曾任国家开发银行董事长、第十二届全国政协副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former national-deputy level leader, and the eldest son of Chen Yun. He has served as the Chairman of the China Development Bank and a Vice Chairman of the 12th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的高级领导人，曾任国务院副总理。
description.en: A senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who once served as Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 陈元之子。
description.en: Son of Chen Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 陈元之女，曾就读于杜克大学和哈佛大学商学院。
description.en: Daughter of Chen Yuan, an alumna of Duke University and Harvard Business School.

description.zh-cn: 陈元的第一任妻子，清华大学同学。
description.en: Chen Yuan's first wife, a classmate from Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来之子，曾与陈晓丹交往。
description.en: Son of Bo Xilai, who once dated Chen Xiaodan.

description.zh-cn: 中国经济学家，曾为陈元的导师。
description.en: Chinese economist who was a mentor to Chen Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中国经济学家，曾为陈元的导师。
description.en: Chinese economist who was a mentor to Chen Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任全国政协主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国人民银行行长、国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Governor of the People's Bank of China and Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国人民银行行长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Governor of the People's Bank of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，原中共重庆市委书记，后因贪腐问题被查处。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee, who was later investigated for corruption.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的高级领导人之一。
description.en: One of the senior leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央总书记、中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 北京市的一所著名中学。
description.en: A renowned high school in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的著名高等学府。
description.en: A renowned institution of higher education located in Beijing, China.

en: University of Shanghai for Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海的高等学府，前身为上海机械学院。
description.en: An institution of higher education in Shanghai, China, formerly known as Shanghai Institute of Mechanical Engineering.

nodes.id: 中国社会科学院研究生院

zh-cn: 中国社会科学院研究生院
en: Graduate School of the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences

description.zh-cn: 中国社会科学院下属的研究生培养机构。
description.en: The graduate education institution under the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在北京市西城区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Xicheng District, Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在北京市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央银行。
description.en: The central bank of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的开发性金融机构。
description.en: A development finance institution in China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第十二届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十二届全国委员会
en: 12th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的第十二届全国委员会。
description.en: The 12th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府。
description.en: The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 对中华人民共和国政治权力体系中，拥有国家级正职、国家级副职等最高层职务的党、政、军领导人的统称。
description.en: A collective term for the highest-ranking party, government, and military leaders in the political power structure of the People's Republic of China, holding top positions such as national-level principal and national-level deputy posts.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公务员体系中的一个高级别职务等级。
description.en: A high-level position rank within the civil service system of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国北卡罗来纳州的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in North Carolina, United States.

description.zh-cn: 哈佛大学的研究生商学院。
description.en: The graduate business school of Harvard University.

description.zh-cn: 美国跨国投资银行和金融服务公司。
description.en: An American multinational investment bank and financial services company.

description.zh-cn: 一家总部位于伦敦的全球性投资公司。
description.en: A global investment firm with its headquarters in London.

description.zh-cn: 陈元出生地，当时隶属江苏省，现为上海市青浦区。
description.en: Birthplace of Chen Yuan, which was part of Jiangsu Province at the time and is now Qingpu District, Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国直辖市。陈元执掌的国家开发银行曾向其批准大量贷款。
description.en: A municipality directly under the Central Government of the People's Republic of China. The China Development Bank, led by Chen Yuan, approved substantial loans to the city.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京市西城区的金融中心区，其规划蓝图由陈元主持制定。
description.en: A financial center in Xicheng District, Beijing, whose planning blueprint was developed under the leadership of Chen Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 陈元是陈云的长子。
description.en: Chen Yuan is the eldest son of Chen Yun.

description.zh-cn: 陈坚是陈元的儿子。
description.en: Chen Jian is the son of Chen Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 陈晓丹是陈元的女儿。
description.en: Chen Xiaodan is the daughter of Chen Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 陈元与第一任妻子孙王黎于1972年结婚，孙王黎于1980年病逝。
description.en: Chen Yuan married his first wife, Sun Wangli, in 1972. Sun Wangli passed away from illness in 1980.

description.zh-cn: 陈元于1945年1月出生于江苏省青浦县。
description.en: Chen Yuan was born in Qingpu County, Jiangsu Province in January 1945.

description.zh-cn: 陈元于1964年毕业于北京四中。
description.en: Chen Yuan graduated from Beijing No. 4 High School in 1964.

description.zh-cn: 陈元于1964年至1970年在清华大学自动控制系学习。
description.en: Chen Yuan studied in the Department of Automatic Control at Tsinghua University from 1964 to 1970.

description.zh-cn: 陈元于1978年至1980年在上海机械学院（今上海理工大学）系统工程研究生班学习。
description.en: From 1978 to 1980, Chen Yuan studied in the Systems Engineering postgraduate class at Shanghai Institute of Mechanical Engineering (now University of Shanghai for Science and Technology).

relationships.target: 中国社会科学院研究生院

description.zh-cn: 陈元于1981年毕业于中国社会科学院研究生院经济系企业管理专业，获硕士学位。
description.en: Chen Yuan graduated in 1981 from the Graduate School of the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences with a Master's degree in Enterprise Management from the Department of Economics.

description.zh-cn: 陈元曾师从经济学家马洪。
description.en: Chen Yuan was a student of economist Ma Hong.

description.zh-cn: 陈元曾师从经济学家于光远。
description.en: Chen Yuan was a student of economist Yu Guangyuan.

description.zh-cn: 陈元在中国人民银行任职期间，曾在行长李贵鲜领导下工作。
description.en: During his tenure at the People's Bank of China, Chen Yuan worked under Governor Li Guixian.

description.zh-cn: 陈元在中国人民银行任职期间，曾在行长朱镕基领导下工作。
description.en: During his tenure at the People's Bank of China, Chen Yuan worked under Governor Zhu Rongji.

description.zh-cn: 陈元在中国人民银行任职期间，曾在行长戴相龙领导下工作。
description.en: During his tenure at the People's Bank of China, Chen Yuan worked under Governor Dai Xianglong.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十二届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 陈元在俞正声担任全国政协主席期间任副主席。
description.en: Chen Yuan served as Vice Chairman while Yu Zhengsheng was the Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2013年3月，陈元当选全国政协副主席，成为党和国家领导人。
description.en: In March 2013, Chen Yuan was elected Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee, becoming a Party and state leader.

description.zh-cn: 陈元主持的西城区金融区规划成为如今北京金融街的蓝图。
description.en: The financial district plan for Xicheng, overseen by Chen Yuan, became the blueprint for today's Beijing Financial Street.

description.zh-cn: 2013年清明节期间，陈元为薄一波敬献花篮，以示纪念。
description.en: During the Qingming Festival in 2013, Chen Yuan presented a flower basket in memory of Bo Yibo.

description.zh-cn: 有外媒分析认为，陈元因批准过多贷款给重庆，从而与时任市委书记薄熙来牵涉过深。
description.en: Some foreign media analyses suggest that Chen Yuan became deeply involved with then-municipal party secretary Bo Xilai by approving excessive loans to Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 2013年4月11日，陈元在《人民日报》发表文章，称赞江泽民的反腐功绩。
description.en: On April 11, 2013, Chen Yuan published an article in the People's Daily praising Jiang Zemin's anti-corruption achievements.

description.zh-cn: 陈云曾任国务院副总理。
description.en: Chen Yun once served as Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 江泽民出任中共总书记是陈云向邓小平力荐的结果。
description.en: Jiang Zemin's appointment as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee was the result of Chen Yun's strong recommendation to Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 有评论称，江泽民为陈元安排了全国政协副主席的职务。
description.en: According to some commentators, Jiang Zemin arranged the position of Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee for Chen Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 陈晓丹2007年毕业于杜克大学经济系。
description.en: Chen Xiaodan graduated from the Department of Economics at Duke University in 2007.

description.zh-cn: 陈晓丹在2010年至2012年间曾与薄瓜瓜交往。
description.en: Chen Xiaodan dated Bo Guagua between 2010 and 2012.

description.zh-cn: 陈元执掌国家开发银行期间，曾向重庆市批准了大量贷款。
description.en: During Chen Yuan's leadership, the China Development Bank approved a large number of loans to Chongqing.
